org.fax4j.spi.comm

Interface CommPortAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommPortAdapter, RXTXCommPortAdapter

    public interface CommPortAdapter
extends Closeable
    This class defines the COMM port adapter.
    Since:
    0.39a
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sagie Gur-Ari

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InputStream getInputStream()
      This function returns the input stream to the COMM port.
      OutputStream getOutputStream()
      This function returns the output stream to the COMM port.
      boolean isOpen()
      Returns true if the adapter is valid and open.
